title.narrative: OPERATIONAL SUPPORT FOR DELIVERY OF PROGRAMME RESULTS

description.narrative: operational support for delivery of programme results,which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Effectiveness Outcome: Country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

mailing-address.narrative: C/o UNICEF Amman P.O. Box 1551 Amman 11821

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: operational support for delivery of programme results

description.narrative: To achieve programme results, UNICEF Iraq Country Office procured and delivered the goods and services to end-user worth at USD $39,263,347.97 (as per 12/Dec/2019). The breakdowns are; services at $17,353,977.37, programme supplies at $14,939,982.52, procurement services at $6,296,497.80, international freight at $397,610.18 and operational supplies at $275,280.10. Constructions and rehabilitations are major categories for institutional service contracts. The significant increase is in procurement services where UNICEF has been building trust and working together closely with the national counterpart. On the other hand, procurement of programme supplies was decreased. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/12/2018
